# Ignite Dragonmark (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Artificer Spells|Artificer 2]], [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Druid Spells|Druid 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, Dr

**Range:** Medium (100 ft. + 10 ft./level)

**Target:** One dragonmarked creature

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Will half; see text

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Dragonmarked (WotC), pg. 152

*With a soft utterance and a sharp thrust of your hand, you cause the target’s dragonmark to burst into flame.*

The target’s dragonmark ignites momentarily, dealing it 1d6 points of fire damage per caster level (maximum 5d6). In addition, the target cannot use any of its dragonmark powers for 1 round per 5 points of damage taken (rounded down).

*Dragonmark:* Any true or aberrant dragonmark.
